s: I love this granola. It tastes amazing and is good quality. Occasionally I will get a bag that seems to have less toppings which is disappointing but I don’t know how they’d regulate that haha. The coconut shavings are dry and a wider width than average shaved coconut pieces, which makes the texture better in my opinion. The little chocolatey bits are crunchy and delicious. t: Love Crunch Brand Story – Nature's Path
s: Originally created by Arjan and Rimjhim Stephens as a wedding favor for their guests, Love Crunch granola was such an immense hit they decided to make it an official Nature’s Path product — one they could use as a way to give back.
